Title: HugeFlow.OOB
Description:
Silverlight OOB Library
It supports useful custom controls.
WindowChrome, InstallScreen.
HomeWiki:
HugeFlow.OOB

Silverlight OOB Library
It supports useful custom controls.
WindowChrome, InstallScreen.

This makes it easy for developers to implement Silverlight OOB Applications.
HugeFlow.OOB Library has some behaviors and custom controls.

Behaviors

  • OOBCloseWindowBehavior
  • OOBDragMoveWindowBehavior
  • OOBDragResizeWindowBehavior
  • OOBIntallBehavior
  • OOBMaximizeWindowBehavior
  • OOBMinimizeWindowBehavior

Custom Controls

  • InstallScreen
  • WindowChrome
